metadata.name: Crazy party
metadata.description: Hey hey hey. Grab your costume and go to our crazy party! A rejuvenating spa with Lady Gorgon awaits you, a pool in an angry pumpkin with soul-eater fish, a journey to another world through a portal (take care of your hands and head), a battle with zombies for brains. As well as hallucinogenic mushrooms and disgusting drinks! Let's go have fun!
